verses.text: ‘EIKI, ‘oku ou tautapa atu; ke ke vave kiate au: Fakaongo ki hoku le‘o ‘o kau ka ui atu.
Ke hoko atu ‘eku lotu ki ho ‘ao na, ‘o hangē ko e ‘inisēnisi; ‘A e fola hoku ongo nima ni ke hangē ko e feilaulau efiafi.
Fokotu‘u, ‘Eiki, ha le‘o ki hoku ngutu; Tauhi ‘a e matapā ‘o hoku loungutu.
‘Oua ‘e ofe‘i hoku loto ki ha me‘a hala, Ke u mo‘ua ‘i he ngaahi feinga angahala Fakataha mo e kau matāpule ngāue pango: ‘Io, ‘oua na‘a ku kai ‘enau me‘a vovo.
Ka taa‘i au ‘e he angatonu, ko e ‘ofa ia; Pea ko ‘ene valoki au, ko ‘ene pani kita; Ke ‘oua na‘a momoi ‘e hoku ‘ulu: He kei ‘atā ke u lotua ‘enau pau‘u.
Ka lī ‘enau kau fakamaau ‘i he tafa lilifa, Te nau toki ‘ilo ‘oku melie ‘eku lea.
Ka laku hotau ngaahi hui he ngutu ‘o Hētesi, ‘Oku hangē ko e palau ‘o e kelekele ‘e he tama keli:
He ko koe, ‘e Sihova ‘Ātonai, ‘oku hanga ki ai hoku mata ni; Ko koe Kuo u hūfanga ki ai; ‘Oua ‘e lilingi ‘eku mo‘ui.
Tauhi au mei he hele kuo nau fakatoka mai, Mo e ngaahi helepuna ‘a e kau ngāue kovi.
Ke tō ‘a e kau angahala ki he‘enau ngaahi kupenga, ‘Osi te te hao ai kita.
